Category:Light Hammers

Category for all the Light Hammers in the game.

Item Enchantments ML Damage and Type Bind Quests Unusual Characteristics
Nicked Light Hammer*
  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls.
  • Electrifying 2Electrifying 2: This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 2d6 Lightning damage on each hit.
  • Shatter +4Shatter +4: This effect gives a +4 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved sunder attempts.
  • Deadly +3 Deadly +3: +3 Competence bonus to weapon damage.

First Light (level 5)
  • +2 Enhancement Bonus+2 Enhancement Bonus: +2 enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls.
  • Negative Energy Absorption 16%Negative Energy Absorption 16%: This effect absorbs 16% of all negative damage the character would have taken, after all other protections have been penetrated.
  • Negative Resistance +14Negative Resistance +14: Passive: +14 Enhancement bonus to your Negative Resistance.
  • Blazing 5This effect causes the edges of this weapon to coruscate, dealing 5d6 Light damage on each critical hit.
  • Coruscating 2Coruscating 2: This effect causes the edges if this weapon to coruscate, dealing 2d6 Light damage on each hit.
  • Empty Purple Augment Slot Red Augments
    • Damage per ML: Ruby Eye augments, Meteoric Star Ruby, etc.
    • DR bypass: Alignment, Material
    • Deconstructor
    • Elemental damage: +1 to +2d6
    • Ruby of Ghostbane
    • Ruby of the Endless Night
    • Ruby of the Vampire Slayer
    • Spell Power (Enhancement bonus): +30 to +138
    Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Golem's Heart
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +5 to +40
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +2 to +16
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8
    Colorless Augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +8

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2

Alchemical Light Hammer
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls.
  • Alchemical (Prototype)Alchemical (Prototype): This experimental item, crafted and enchanted at ancient Cannith creation forges using powerful alchemy, is made of a material that allows elemental power sources to be bound to it. This item is in a prototype state and is currently in need of refinement before an elemental can be bound to it.
